// src/components/AboutUs.js import React from "react"; const About = () => { return (

About iNotebook

A secure and simple place to keep all your notes online.

What is iNotebook?

iNotebook is your personal online notebook where you can **create, edit, and delete your notes securely**. All your notes are linked to your account, so you can access them anytime, anywhere ‚Äî just by logging in with your email.

Our goal is to make note‚Äëtaking fast, simple, and safe. Whether it's study notes, work ideas, or personal reminders, iNotebook keeps them all in one place.

üîí Secure

Your notes are private and protected ‚Äî only you can access them using your login credentials.

üìù Easy to Use

Add, edit, or delete notes with just a few clicks in a clean and simple interface.

üåç Accessible

Access your notes anytime, from any device, by simply logging in to your account.

); }; export default About;
